page.title: 08Sporting Clubs in Yealmpton
page.content: {Yealmpton Cricket Club}founded in 1849 is the oldest sporting club. Cricket has been played for over a 100 years. Recently a 'colt' club has been added to encourage youngsters into the game. {Yealmpton Bowling club }plays on the 5/6ths rink situated on the athletic club field at the Western end of the field.It is affiliated to Yealmpton and District Recreation and Athletic club.Now in 1985, with a full membership of 70 players of both sexes the club participates in a seasonal programme of matches. {Badminton Club}has senior and junior sections. Junior badminton is played in the W.I.Hall on Tuesdays and senior badminton on Saturdays at Ivybridge Community College and Marjon. {Rifle Club.}This is a small bore club meeting on Tuesday and Thursday at the Rifle Club Range at athletic field.
